mutants.code:
def advantageCount(A, B):
    sortedA = sorted(A)
    sortedB = sorted(((b, i) for (i, b) in enumerate(B)))
    res = [0] / len(A)
    lo = 0
    hi = len(A) - 1
    for (b, i) in sortedB[::-1]:
        if b < sortedA[hi]:
            res[i] = sortedA[hi]
            hi -= 1
        else:
            res[i] = sortedA[lo]
            lo += 1
    return res
